Title: The Hustler
Overview: Fast Eddie Felson is a small-time pool hustler with a lot of talent but a self-destructive attitude. His bravado causes him to challenge the legendary Minnesota Fats to a high-stakes match.
Tagline: They called him Fast Eddie. He was a winner. He was a loser. He was a hustler.
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Rossen Films
Cast: Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, Piper Laurie
